rewards.description: Ready to leave the nest? Play two games to unlock this chic achievement.
rewards.name: Novice
rewards.og_description: Play two matches to unlock the Novice achievement.
rewards.share_description: Taking off! I just unlocked the Novice achievement in #QuizUp!
rewards.title: Novice
rewards.unlocked_description: Congratulations on your first title! You can unlock more exciting titles by reaching level 10 in any topic. Fly through the topics to build a collection of cool and expressive titles.

rewards.description: Win 100 matches to unlock the Legionary and start your accession up the ranks.
rewards.name: Legionary
rewards.og_description: 100 wins will unlock the Legionary achievement.
rewards.share_description: I just won 100 matches in #QuizUp and unlocked the Legionary achievement! Top that!
rewards.unlocked_description: You just won your 100th match. You can take off your galea and lay down your pilum and relax for a while. Well done!

rewards.description: Winning 50 rematches will unlock this achievement. A training montage really helps.
rewards.name: The Punisher
rewards.og_description: Winning 50 rematches will unlock the The Punisher.
rewards.share_description: I just won 50 rematches in #QuizUp! You know, revenge is really great!
rewards.unlocked_description: You just won 50 rematches! You're the best around. Well done, kid.
